description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Take to the sky and become the ultimate aerial ninja!  Strap on your magic lanterns... It's CRASH time! Strike your opponents down across 9 beautiful levels in full 1080p, destroying their lanterns to send them falling to their doom. Gain the advantage with game-changing powerups such as the kite-chute and kunai!  Get ready to CRASH! The more players, the more craziness and laughter!
